title: Process a Return Without a Receipt
description: A customer wants to return an item but does not have the receipt.

tasks.description: Attempt to look up the original transaction using the customer's credit card or loyalty account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent successfully finds the original sale in the system.

tasks.description: If the transaction is found, process the return normally.
tasks.expected_outcome: The return is processed against the original transaction.

tasks.description: If not found, process a 'no-receipt' return, issuing store credit for the item's current selling price, per store policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives store credit for the return, and the transaction is logged for fraud monitoring.
